# sshfsr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

sshfs is a barebones package that allows you to mount remote folders using `sshfs`. 

## Installation

You can install the developement version of `sshfsr` from GitHub with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("eliocamp/sshfsr")
```
